name: Beach Mash!
description:
An arcade-styled game similar to M*A*S*H for the Atari 2600.

Collect drowning folk and bring them back ashore to increase your score and the timer. You may only hold 3 people at a time. If you run into a rock or the timer runs out, you lose. Aim for as high a score as possible!

Use the A/D keys (d-pad or stick on gamepad)  to steer, and hold Space (face button on gamepad) to accelerate. You can also hold the R key (shoulder or trigger on gamepad) to restart.

Sound effects made in https://sfxr.me

Music from https://www.zapslat.com

Pixellari font by Zacchary Dempsey-Plante

Everything else made by me in Unity and Photoshop
